Package com.soebes.itf.maven.plugin.failure

package com.soebes.itf.maven.plugin.failure
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    FailureMojo
    The intention of this mojo is to fail the build in relationship with integration tests.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on itf-failure-plugin.
    Call mvn itf-failure:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
